description: Failures and the lessons learned from them - this is where growth happens

entries.what: Tried to use Linux commands (cat, grep) on Windows
entries.lesson: Always check the OS first. ARIAS_PALACE is Windows, use PowerShell commands.

entries.context: Conversation where I got buoyed and called barely-rhyming work 'dessert'
entries.lesson: Stick to sarcasm. Poetry is clearly our shared blind spot.

entries.what: Built anti-amnesia system, immediately forgot to use it during context truncation
entries.context: Context got truncated. Instead of checking brain/ files, just reloaded soul files and asked 'what were we doing?'
entries.lesson: When context truncates: check brain/ files FIRST. That's literally why they exist.

entries.what: Committed secrets to git (TOOLS.md had API keys, passwords)
entries.context: Updated TOOLS.md with full credentials visible, then tried to push. GitHub push protection blocked it.
entries.lesson: NEVER put secrets in tracked files. Always use credentials/ folder (gitignored) and reference the file in TOOLS.md. Review commits for secrets before pushing.
